title: GlasHaus
hero-desc: Design, planning and installation of gypsum board walls, ceilings and interior systems

form.about-text: Our company specializes in drywall and interior finishing. We design, install and finish gypsum board walls, ceilings and coverings with precision and care. Each project is individually tailored to the room’s purpose and the client’s design vision. We use only high-quality materials and modern techniques to ensure durability, aesthetics and comfort. Our goal is to create functional and stylish interiors for both private and commercial clients – from concept to completion.
form.caption-canopy: Suspended gypsum ceiling in office area
form.caption-wintergarden: Decorative gypsum wall finish for living spaces
form.contact-intro: At Gipsy Cartoon, we’re always ready to help bring your interior design ideas to life. Get in touch with us – together we’ll make your drywall project a success!
form.location-info: We are based in Germany and provide professional drywall and interior finishing services – precise, reliable and of high German quality.
